data.quote: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Quite people have the loudest minds.
data.author: Stephen Hawking

data.quote: To win without risk is a triumph without glory.
data.author: Corneille

data.quote: Passion is the genesis of Genius.
data.author: Galileo Galilei

data.quote: The face becomes a Mirror of the Soul.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Ask the right questions and nature will open the doors to her secrets.
data.author: Sir C.V.Raman

data.quote: Well done is better than well said.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: How you think when you lose determines how long it will be until you win
data.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

data.quote: Arise , Awake and stop not till the goal is reached.
data.author: Swami Vivekanand

data.quote: Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
data.author: Marilyn Monroe

data.quote: Winners are not those who never fail but those who never quit.
data.author: A.P.J.Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Man - a being in search of meaning.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: If you want to walk fast, walk alone. But if you want to walk far, walk together.
data.author: Ratan Tata

data.quote: Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
data.author: Bhagavad Gita

data.quote: The  future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
data.author: Malcolm X

data.quote: We learn little from victory, much from defeat.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Success is achieved twice. Once in the mind and the second time in the real world.
data.author: Azim Premji
